resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158807</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158807</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1654</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tu Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tu Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tu Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tu Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tu Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">TU Bishvat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tu Bishvat</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Get to know the names of the Tu Bishvat fruit in English, match word cards to pictures and learn about the costumes of the holiday and the importance of protecting the environment</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Tu Bishvat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen Sie, die Namen der Tu Bishvat Frucht auf
englisch zu kennen, bringen Sie Wortkarten zu den Abbildungen zusammen
und erlernen Sie über die Kostüme des Feiertags und des Wertes des 
Schützens der Umgebung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Finissez par savoir les noms du fruit de Tu 
Bishvat en anglais, appariez les cartes de mot aux images et 
renseignez-vous sur les costumes des vacances et de l'importance de 
protéger l'environnement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conheça os nomes da fruta de Tu Bishvat em 
inglês, combine cartões da palavra aos retratos e aprenda-os sobre 
os trajes do feriado e da importância de proteger o ambiente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Familiarizzisi con i nomi della frutta di Tu 
Bishvat in inglese, abbini le schedi di parola alle immagini ed impari
circa i costumi della festa e dell'importanza di protezione 
dell'ambiente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνωρίστε να ξέρετε τα ονόματα των φρούτων TU 
Bishvat στα αγγλικά, ταιριάξτε με τις κάρτες λέξης τις εικόνες
και μάθετε για τα κοστούμια των διακοπών και σπουδαιότητας το 
περιβάλλον</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Familiarícese con los nombres de la fruta de Tu 
Bishvat en inglés, corresponda con las tarjetas de la palabra a los 
cuadros y aprenda sobre los trajes del día de fiesta y de la 
importancia de proteger el ambiente</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tu Bishvat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'anglais d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tu Bishvat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
